description: Your Keep is the center of your empire.

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

description: The Storehouse, heavily guarded, protects your resources from enemy invaders. From time to time, shipments of advanced resources are sent to your storehouse that improve with the level of the building.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

name: Smithy

stats.description: Increase how fast equipment is forged at your Smithy.
stats.name: Forging Speed

stats.description: Reduce the amount of Steel required to forge equipment at the Smithy.

description: The Rookery allows you to accommodate greater numbers of reinforcements from your allegiance. Reinforcements automatically return home after 24-hours and do not affect your troop upkeep rates.

stats.description: The number of troops that can participate in the Rallies you start.

description: Use your free daily prayers to gain resources at the Shrine. Remember to visit the Shrine every day, because today's free prayers do not carry over to tomorrow. You can pray a maximum of 200 times a day. Free daily prayers are granted at the start of each day.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

costs.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

costs.description:

name: War Camp

stats.description: The number of troops a building can train at once.
stats.name: Training Capacity

stats.description: How much faster you train troops.
stats.name: Training Speed

description: Crucial for healing your wounded! If your Medic Tents are already at full capacity, any additional wounded troops will die. Your higher tier troops are given priority over lower tier troops.

Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
costs.name: Keystone

costs.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
costs.name: Valyrian Stone

costs.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Brick

costs.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
costs.name: Soldier Pine

description: When the Medic Tents have reached their wounded capacity, most of your remaining top 2 tiers of troops will go to the Red Temple. These troops are Doomed and can only be healed by Light, which is collected periodically at this building.
name: Red Temple

description: The Tower of the Hand allows you to summon and upgrade Heroes and assign them to your Small Council.
name: Tower of the Hand

description: From the Iron Gate, you can launch or join battlegrounds with your allegiance.
name: Iron Gate
